text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host
. Welcome to our phonics song
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
“Presenting the very pleasant Mr. P.

Its time to celebrate
Hey, Hey, Hey let’s not wait

Start the P P party
A fun filled party.
Its time to celebrate Hey, Hey, Hey let’s not wait
Start the P P party a fun filled party.
See what’s on that P P plate, Its sure to taste real great
P P P P pizza a hot and cheesy Pizza.
What else begins with p p p? What else begins with p p p?
That sounds like a parrot, A P P P P parrot
There is another bird I know that loves to put on a fancy show
A P P P peacock a bright and Pretty Peacock.
A paintbrush, long and thin Is what I use to dip in…
P P P P paint Red, blue, yellow and green paint.
On P P P P paper so white message I write

With my P P  pencil 
P P Paper and P P Pencil
What I like to eat, In the hot humid summer heat?
A P P P Pineapple a big and juicy pineapple
Oh! and what I love to eat Is a big and tasty treat.
Its called a P P pudding a custard pudding.
I also like to munch on something that goes crunch

It’s P P P popcorn
Caramel and cheesy popcorn.
When I am ready to sleep on to my bed I love to leap
Wearing my P P pyjamas my pink and purple pyjamas
Oh Mr. P is so tired. It’s time that he retired.
So judges, give us the score Before Mr P begins to snore.
Perfect!
Peppy!
Pleasant!
Playful!
Peachy!
Thank you Mr. P, and you pleasant Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Adios!
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
